div.h2: Welcome to beaver river central school!

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 6px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(29, 33, 41); font-size: 14px;

div.style: display: inline; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(29, 33, 41); font-size: 14px;

p.span: Beaver River Central School serves as a center for education in
with students, staff, parents, and community to provide each student the opportunity to achieve
in all areas of life and learning now and in the future.

div.div: Beaver River Health Clinic: Closing after Friday, April 10, 2020
As the COVID-19 School Closure has been extended into the fourth quarter, BRCSD will be adjusting our instructional plan.
